blogPost.excerpt: GitWrapped allows you to view the statistics of your Github profile over the years, the amount of lines you wrote, how many pull requests you closed and more! Compare stats with your friends and show off on social media! #GitWrapped #Wrapped #Github2020
blogPost.body: GitWrapped allows you to view the statistics of your Github profile over the years, the amount of lines you wrote, how many pull requests you closed and more! Compare stats with your friends and show off on social media! #GitWrapped #Wrapped #Github2020
blogPost.title: GitWrapped - View/Share how you contributed to Github over the years
blogPost.author: DanCodes

localize.description: GitWrased允许你查看这些年来你的Github个人资料的统计数据，你写了多少行，你完成了多少拉请求等等！与您的朋友比较统计数据并在社交媒体上炫耀！#GitWraped #Wrabl #Github2020
localize.tagline: 查看/分享这些年来您是如何为Github做出贡献的

localize.description: GitWrased允許你查看這些年來你的Github個人資料的統計數據，你寫了多少行，你完成了多少拉請求等等！與您的朋友比較統計數據並在社交媒體上炫耀！#GitWraped #Wrabl #Github2020
localize.tagline: 查看/分享這些年來您是如何爲Github做出貢獻的

previous.excerpt: Open, browse, and drop icons from your existing IconJars. Add, delete, or replace icons in existing IconJars. Or, export your artboards to a new IconJar right in Illustrator - on Mac or Windows. You don't need to have IconJar installed (but we recommend it).
previous.title: Icon Mason - Open, edit, & create IconJars directly in Adobe Illustrator

localize.description: 从现有的IconJars中打开、浏览和拖放图标。添加、删除或替换现有IconJars中的图标。或者，直接在Illustrator中将画板导出到新的IconJar(在Mac或Windows上)。您不需要安装IconJar(但我们建议您这样做)。
localize.tagline: 直接在Adobe Illustrator中打开、编辑和创建IconJars

localize.description: 從現有的IconJars中打開、瀏覽和拖放圖標。添加、刪除或替換現有IconJars中的圖標。或者，直接在Illustrator中將畫板導出到新的IconJar(在Mac或Windows上)。您不需要安裝IconJar(但我們建議您這樣做)。
localize.tagline: 直接在Adobe Illustrator中打開、編輯和創建IconJars

next.excerpt: Ship faster and improve team satisfaction with engineering analytics powered by your Github data. -- → Visualize the entire delivery process from commit to deploy → Highlight bottlenecks like code review → Spot issues like feature delays and team burnout.
next.title: Haystack - Ship faster and improve dev happiness

localize.description: 借助由您的Github数据提供支持的工程分析，加快发货速度并提高团队满意度。--→可视化整个交付过程，从提交到部署，→突出瓶颈(如代码审查)，→发现问题(如功能延迟和团队倦怠)。
localize.tagline: 加快发货速度，提高开发人员幸福感

localize.description: 藉助由您的Github數據提供支持的工程分析，加快發貨速度並提高團隊滿意度。--→可視化整個交付過程，從提交到部署，→突出瓶頸(如代碼審查)，→發現問題(如功能延遲和團隊倦怠)。
localize.tagline: 加快發貨速度，提高開發人員幸福感
